env_paths
=========

.. py:module:: env_paths


Attributes
----------

.. autoapisummary::

   env_paths.__author__
   env_paths.__description__
   env_paths.logger


Functions
---------

.. autoapisummary::

   env_paths.root_exp_dir
   env_paths.dataset_path
   env_paths.custom_dataset_dir
   env_paths.custom_dataset_path
   env_paths.arch_path
   env_paths.custom_arch_dir
   env_paths.custom_arch_path
   env_paths.custom_model_dir
   env_paths.model_output_dir
   env_paths.model_args_path
   env_paths.model_interpretations_dir
   env_paths.model_interpretations_output_dir
   env_paths.model_predictions_dir
   env_paths.ckpt_path
   env_paths.learning_data_path
   env_paths.learning_curves_path


Module Contents
---------------

.. py:data:: __author__
   :value: 'tiantheunissen@gmail.com'


.. py:data:: __description__
   :value: 'Contains functions that dynamically return KnowIt environment paths.'


.. py:data:: logger

.. py:function:: root_exp_dir(exp_output_dir: str, safe_mode: bool = True, overwrite: bool = False)

   Returns the root experiment output directory. 


.. py:function:: dataset_path(name: str)

   Returns the dataset path for the given dataset name from the default datasets directory.


.. py:function:: custom_dataset_dir(exp_output_dir: str, safe_mode: bool = True, overwrite: bool = False)

   Returns the dataset directory from the given experiment path.
   Note that the directory is created if it does not exist. 


.. py:function:: custom_dataset_path(name: str, exp_output_dir: str)

   Returns the dataset path for the given dataset name from the given experiment path.


.. py:function:: arch_path(name: str)

   Returns the architecture path for the given architecture name from the default architectures directory.


.. py:function:: custom_arch_dir(exp_output_dir: str, safe_mode: bool = True, overwrite: bool = False)

   Returns the architecture directory from the given experiment path.
   Note that the directory is created if it does not exist. 


.. py:function:: custom_arch_path(name: str, exp_output_dir: str)

   Returns the architecture path for the given architecture name from the given experiment path.


.. py:function:: custom_model_dir(exp_output_dir: str, safe_mode: bool = True, overwrite: bool = False)

   Returns the model directory from the given experiment path.
   Note that the directory is created if it does not exist. 


.. py:function:: model_output_dir(exp_output_dir: str, name: str, safe_mode: bool = True, overwrite: bool = False)

   Returns the model output directory for the given model name from the given experiment path.


.. py:function:: model_args_path(exp_output_dir: str, name: str)

   Returns the model args path for the given model name from the given experiment path.


.. py:function:: model_interpretations_dir(exp_output_dir: str, name: str, safe_mode: bool = True, overwrite: bool = False)

   Returns the interpretations directory for the given model name from the given experiment path.


.. py:function:: model_interpretations_output_dir(exp_output_dir: str, model_name: str, interpretation_name: str, safe_mode: bool = True, overwrite: bool = False)

   Returns the interpretation output directory for the given model and interpretation name
   from the given experiment path.


.. py:function:: model_predictions_dir(exp_output_dir: str, name: str, safe_mode: bool = True, overwrite: bool = False)

   Returns the predictions directory for the given model name from the given experiment path.


.. py:function:: ckpt_path(exp_output_dir: str, name: str)

   Returns the ckpt path for the given model name from the given experiment path.
   Note that if multiple are found, the first one is returned.


.. py:function:: learning_data_path(exp_output_dir: str, name: str)

   Returns the learning data path for the given model name from the given experiment path.


.. py:function:: learning_curves_path(exp_output_dir: str, name: str)

   Returns the learning curves path for the given model name from the given experiment path.
